mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.liuyan_name as liuyanName ,a.liuyan_types as liuyanTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.liuyan_content as liuyanContent ,a.reply_content as replyContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.sex_types as sexTypes
FROM liuyan a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId}
and a.liuyan_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.liuyanName},'%')
and a.liuyan_types = #{params.liuyanTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.liuyan_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.liuyanContent},'%')
and a.reply_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.replyContent},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
